ygData.subject: Re: prices for enchanting metal
ygData.msgSnippet: I have gotten away with selling it for 5g per enchant so far.  That is the only rate I have seen it go for. Gwynn 13th level (the cursed level) Bristlebane I
ygData.messageBody:
I have gotten away with selling it for 5g per enchant so far. That is the
only rate I have seen it go for.

Gwynn 13th level (the cursed level)
Bristlebane

I don't know about you but the 2 bubbles before 13th level and after 13th
level are cursed. I died at least 15-20 times during that period. I have
finally broken free.
------
When the people we love are stolen from us, the way to have them live on is
to never stop loving them. Buildings burn, people die, but real love is
forever. -- The Crow
-----Original Message-----
From: DeGirolami, Franck <degirolami@...>
To: Eqenchanters (E-mail) <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, May 10, 1999 12:46 PM
Subject: [eqenchanters] prices for enchanting metal


>From: "DeGirolami, Franck" <degirolami@...>
>
>I've been enchanting silver for a bunch of fellow jewelers. I've charged
>from 1 to 2 gold a piece so far.
>What do you guys charge? What about for electrum?
>Skara
>
>
